subject: Television
Golf
Ratings and Rating Systems
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: A 35 percent drop for the final round of the P.G.A. Championship on CBS came on the heels of a 53 percent drop in viewership on ESPN for the fourth round of last month’s British Open.
snippet: A 35 percent drop for the final round of the P.G.A. Championship on CBS came on the heels of a 53 percent drop in viewership on ESPN for the fourth round of last month’s British Open.
